regen.new_specification: The system shall not allow re-enabling or recovery of deleted user accounts that had no history associated with them.

regen.absent_element: specification for re-enabling disabled accounts with history
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the System Administrator to re-enable a deactivated account that has history associated with it.

regen.absent_element: specifying what happens to account history when an account is deleted
regen.new_specification: The system shall permanently remove all associated history when an account without history is deleted.

label: If an account has any history associated with it, it can only be deactivated and not deleted.
absence: situation of an account has any history
